name: Magician's hat Witch's hat
description:
Magician's hat Witch's hat is a sokoban puzzle with magical hats.

24 levels (12 Magician's hat + 12 Witch's hat)

WASD/Arrow to move. Z to undo. R to restart. ESC to level select.

Sorry, this game has a few bugs in certain behaviors. If you think something is wrong, ...don't do that! It is probably unintended behavior! press the undo, please.

Made in 48h for the Thinky Puzzle Game Jam 2.

[hack] https://auroriax.github.io/PuzzleScript/editor.html?hack=8faa08c55191f339e2f790e...
